name: Bloodpainter

skills.name: Throwing Spear
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Embers
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Shaman Drum
skills.raw_description:
Fills the Turn Meters of all allies except this Champion by 20%. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Skinwalkers
faction.default_description: Skinwalkers is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 23 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Skinwalkers is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 18 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: As told by the tragic legend of Ch'arocah, Skinwalkers once had the power to cast themselves in the form of any man or beast. But after centuries of overuse, these shamans found themselves entrapped as something less than human, but more than animal. Though wild and dangerous, they can sense evil and may act to prevent it

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Bloodpainter is a rare attack champion from the faction Skinwalkers doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Skinwalkers, Bloodpainter is a champion of Rare rarity and of Attack type
